title: Hurrah! Leaderboards
description: Hurrah! Leaderboards is a fun performance broadcasting software for teams of all kinds. It uses gamification mechanics to boost your teams' motivation and outcomes by providing real-time recognition and metrics. Our leaderboard software connects directly to your CRM or other databases. Make your own leaderboards and start sharing live, fully customized KPIs, communications, and custom media to every team member no matter where they are.
